trans-unit.source: Line Amount captured (%2) is different from Line Amount calculated (%3) using captured Discount % (%4) to calculate Discount Amount (%5) on line %1.
trans-unit.note: %1 = line no. | %2 = captured line amount | %3 = calculated amount | %4 = captured discount in % | %5 = calculated discount
Codeunit ALR Adv. Purch. - Line Valid. - NamedType LineAmountDiffCalcDiscAmtTxt
trans-unit.target: Herkend lijnbedrag (%2) is verschillend van berekend lijnbedrag (%3) met behulp van herkende korting % (%4) om korting (%5) op regel %1 te berekenen.

trans-unit.source: Line Amount captured (%2) is different from Line Amount calculated (%3) using captured Discount Amount (%4) on line %1.
trans-unit.note: %1 = line no. | %2 = captured line amount | %3 = calculated amount | %4 = captured discount
Codeunit ALR Adv. Purch. - Line Valid. - NamedType LineAmountDiffCapDiscAmtTxt
trans-unit.target: Herkend lijnbedrag (%2) is verschillend van berekend lijnbedrag (%3) met behulp van herkende korting % (%4) op regel %1.

trans-unit.source: Line Amount captured (%2) is different from Line Amount calculated (%3) on line %1.
trans-unit.note: %1 = line no. | %2 = captured line amount | %3 = calculated line amount | %4 = captured discount | %5 = calculated discount
Codeunit ALR Adv. Purch. - Line Valid. - NamedType LineAmountDiffTxt
trans-unit.target: Herkend lijnbedrag (%2) is anders dan berekend lijnbedrag (%3) op regel %1.

trans-unit.source: WARNING: %1
trans-unit.note: %1 is the warning message
Codeunit ALR Adv. Purch. - Line Valid. - NamedType WarningTxt
trans-unit.target: WAARSCHUWING: %1

trans-unit.source: %1 | Business Central version:%2 (Build %3)
trans-unit.note: %1 = ALR object version | %2 = BC version | %3 = BC build
Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType ALRVersionNoText
trans-unit.target: %1 | Business Central versie: %2 (Build %3)

trans-unit.source: Error during field setup.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType ErrorDuringFieldSetup
trans-unit.target: Fout tijdens het instellen van het veld.

trans-unit.source: The value of field "%1" will now been searched via the caption in the current line.
trans-unit.note: %1 = field description
Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType FieldIsCapturedByCaption
trans-unit.target: De waarde van veld "%1" zal nu gezocht worden via het bijschrift in de huidige regel.

trans-unit.source: The field "%1" will now be searched via the column heading "%2".
trans-unit.note: %1 = field description | %2 = caption of column heading
Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType FieldIsCapturedByColumnHeading
trans-unit.target: Het veld "%1" zal nu worden doorzocht via de kolom koptekst "%2".

trans-unit.source: The field "%1" is now linked to field "%2"!
trans-unit.note: %1 = field description of selected field | %2 = field description of linked field
Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType FieldIsLinkedToSourceField
trans-unit.target: Het veld "%1" is nu gekoppeld aan het veld "%2"!

trans-unit.source: Field setup aborted because no field was selected!
trans-unit.note: Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType FieldSetupCanceled
trans-unit.target: Veld instellen afgebroken, omdat er geen veld is geselecteerd!

trans-unit.source: The value for for %1 (%2) in line %3 is missing! Please train this value first!
trans-unit.note: Label gives an error when no field value has been captured for a selected field. %1 = Field description, %2 = Field code, %3 = current line no.
Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType lblMissingFieldExampleValue
trans-unit.target: De waarde voor %1 (%2) in rij %3 ontbreekt! train eerst deze waarde!

trans-unit.source: The value for source field "%1" in line %2 is missing! Please train this value first!
trans-unit.note: %1 = source field description | %2 = line no
Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType MissingSourceFieldValue
trans-unit.target: De waarde voor het bronveld "%1" in lijn %2 ontbreekt! train eerst deze waarde!

trans-unit.source: There are not fields configured for advanced line recognition, that can be reset.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType NoALRFieldsForReset
trans-unit.target: Er zijn geen velden, geconfigureerd voor geavanceerde lijnherkenning, gevonden die kunnen worden gereset.

trans-unit.source: No mandatory field with the option "Required" was found in line %1! Configure a mandatory field first.
trans-unit.note: %1 = line no.
Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType NoRequiredFieldFound
trans-unit.target: Er is geen verplicht veld met de optie "Vereist" gevonden in regel %1! Configureer eerst een verplicht veld.

trans-unit.source: Choose the field whose value should be found by the caption in the current line.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType SelectFieldForCaptionSearch
trans-unit.target: Kies het veld waarvan de waarde in de huidige regel moet gevonden worden op basis van de koptekst.

trans-unit.source: Select the field that should be found by the column heading.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType SelectFieldForColumnHeaderSearch
trans-unit.target: Selecteer het veld dat gevonden moet worden bij de koptekst van de kolom.

trans-unit.source: Please select first the source field on the basis of which position the value should be found.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType SelectOffsetSourceFieldFirst
trans-unit.target: Selecteer eerst het bronveld op basis van welke positie de waarde moet worden gevonden.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the field, which should be linked with the source field "%1".
trans-unit.note: %1 = field description of source field
Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType SelectTheOffsetField
trans-unit.target: Kies het veld, welke gekoppeld moet zijn met het bronveld "%1".

trans-unit.source: No caption has been configured for field "%1". You must configure the caption first.
trans-unit.note: %1 = field description
Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType TrainCaptionFirstForField
trans-unit.target: Er is geen bijschrift geconfigureerd voor het veld "%1". Je moet het bijschrift eerst configureren.

trans-unit.source: You are using version advanced line recognition version: %1
trans-unit.note: %1 Displays the current version of the Advanced line recognition to the user including the build
Codeunit ALR Adv. Recognition Mgt. - NamedType YouAreUsingALRVersion
trans-unit.target: U gebruikt versie geavanceerde lijnherkenning versie: %1

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the advanced line recognition option %1 when the template does not have at least one line field marked as required!
trans-unit.note: Show when the template does not have at least one line field marked as required. %1 = selected ALR option
Codeunit ALR Advanced Line Capture - NamedType NoMandatoryFieldsFoundLbl
trans-unit.target: U kunt de geavanceerde lijnherkenning optie %1 niet gebruiken als de template niet beschikt over ten minste één regelveld gemarkeerd als vereist!

trans-unit.source: Adv. line recognition
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action AdvancedLineRecognition - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Geavanceerde lijnherkenning

trans-unit.source: Disables the automatic field detection.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action DisableFieldRecognition - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Schakelt automatische velddetectie uit.

trans-unit.source: Disable field detection
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action DisableFieldRecognition - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Schakel velddetectie uit

trans-unit.source: Enable the automatic field detection. The system will use the last captured field during setting up advanced line recognition.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action EnableFieldRecognition - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Automatische velddetectie inschakelen. Het systeem gebruikt het laatst opgenomen veld tijdens het instellen van geavanceerde lijnherkenning.

trans-unit.source: Enable field detection
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action EnableFieldRecognition - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Veld detectie inschakelen

trans-unit.source: The advanced line recognition settings are reset for the desired field.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action ResetFieldToDefault - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: De geavanceerde lijnherkenning instellingen voor het gewenste veld zijn gereset.

trans-unit.source: Reset field
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action ResetFieldToDefault - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Veld opnieuw instellen

trans-unit.source: The desired field is searched for using a previously trained search text/caption in the area of the current position.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action SearchByCaption - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Het gewenste veld wordt gezocht via een eerder getrainde zoektekst/bijschrift in het gebied van de huidige positie.

trans-unit.source: Find value by caption
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action SearchByCaption - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Vind waarde via bijschrift

trans-unit.source: The desired field is searched for using a previously trained column heading in the range of the current position.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action SearchByColumnHeading - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Het gewenste veld wordt gezocht via een eerder getrainde kolomkop binnen het bereik van de huidige positie.

trans-unit.source: Find value by column heading
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action SearchByColumnHeading - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Vind waarde via kolomkoptekst

trans-unit.source: The desired field is found via a fixed offset (distance) from another field.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action SearchByLinkedField - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Het gewenste veld wordt gevonden via een vaste offset (afstand) uit een ander veld.

trans-unit.source: Find value by linked field
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action SearchByLinkedField - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Vind waarde via gekoppeld veld

trans-unit.source: Displays the currently used version of the advanced line detection.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action ShowVersionNo - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Toont de momenteel gebruikte versie van de geavanceerde lijnherkenning.

trans-unit.source: Version
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Document Lines ListPart - Action ShowVersionNo - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Versie

trans-unit.source: Select if you want to use the default line validation from the template codeunit or the Adv. line recognition validation
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Card - Control ALR Line Validation Type - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Selecteer als u de standaard lijn validatie wilt gebruiken van de template codeunit of de Geavanceerde lijnherkenning validatie

trans-unit.source: Select if you want to use validate the line totals against the net amount of the document
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Card - Control ALRValidateLineTotals - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Selecteer als u wilt dat de regeltotalen gevalideerd worden tegen het netto bedrag van het document

trans-unit.source: Enables the automatic search for purchase order numbers.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Card - Control Auto PO search - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Schakelt automatisch zoeken naar bestelnummers in.

trans-unit.source: Filter string that is used during automatic search for PO numbers.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Card - Control Auto PO search filter - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Filterstring die wordt gebruikt bij het automatisch zoeken naar inkoopordernummers.

trans-unit.source: Advanced Line Recognition
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALR - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Geavanceerde lijnherkenning

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the field value is to be found. With Standard, the field is searched for using the standard line recognition.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALRAdvanced Line Recognition Type - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u aan hoe de waarde van het veld wordt gevonden. Met standaardwaarde wordt het veld gezocht naar het gebruik van de standaard lijnherkenning.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the searched field is searched above or below the line in which the values of the standard line recognition were found.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALRField value Position - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Geeft aan of het zoekveld boven of onder de regel wordt gezocht waarin de waarden van de standaardregelherkenning werden gevonden.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the search direction from the standard line that is used to find the field value.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALRField value search direction - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u de zoekrichting van de standaard regel die wordt gebruikt om de veldwaarde te vinden.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the source field used to calculate the field value via distances/offsets.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALRLinked Field - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Geeft het bronveld in dat gebruikt wordt om de waarde van het veld te bepalen via afstanden/offsets.

trans-unit.source: When value is empty
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALRNoValueFound - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Wanneer de waarde leeg is

trans-unit.source: If the value of the current field is not found, the value is copied to the current line from the same field from the previous line.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALRCopy Value from Previous Value - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Als de waarde van dit veld niet wordt gevonden op de huidige regel, wordt de waarde overgenomen van de vorige regel.

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the selected field is a header or line field (Default = line)
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALRReplacement Header Field - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Geeft aan of het geselecteerde veld een header of regelveld is (standaard = regel)

trans-unit.source: Specifies the line field whose content will be used as value if the value of the current field cannot be found.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALRReplacement Line Field - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Geeft het regelveld aan waarvan de inhoud als waarde wordt gebruikt indien de waarde van het huidige veld niet kan worden gevonden.

trans-unit.source: Offsets
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALROffsets - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Verschuivingen

trans-unit.source: Specifies the expected field width of the field.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALR Typical Value Field Width - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Specificeert de verwachte veldbreedte.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the search text/caption on the X axis.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALR Value Caption Offset X - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Specificeert de afstand naar de zoektekst/bijschrift op de X-as.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the search text/caption on the Y axis.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALR Value Caption Offset Y - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de afstand naar de zoektekst/bijschrift op de X-as.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the bottom.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALROffset Bottom - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de afstand naar de onderkant.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the left.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALROffset Left - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de afstand naar de linkerkant.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the right.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALROffset Right - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de afstand naar de rechterkant.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the distance to the top.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALROffset Top - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de afstand naar de bovenkant.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of the sequence in which the field is processed.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALRSorting - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Bepaalt de positie van de volgorde waarin het veld wordt verwerkt.

trans-unit.source: Change the sign of the number value.
trans-unit.note: PageExtension ALR Template Field Card - Control ALRChangeSign - Property ToolTip
trans-unit.target: Wijzig het teken van de getallenwaarde.

trans-unit.source: Line validation type
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template - Field ALR Line Validation Type - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Lijn validatietype

trans-unit.source: Default template codeunit,Advanced Line Recognition
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template - Field ALR Line Validation Type - Property OptionCaption
trans-unit.target: Standaard template codeunit,Geavanceerde lijnherkenning

trans-unit.source: Automatic PO search
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template - Field Auto PO search - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Auto. ordernummers zoeken

trans-unit.source: Automatic PO search filter
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template - Field Auto PO search filter - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Filter voor auto. zoeken op bestelnummer

trans-unit.source: Do you want to overwrite the existing filter with a new automatically build filter?
trans-unit.note: Ask user to overwrite existingfilter string for automatic PO number filtering.
TableExtension ALR Template - Field Auto PO search filter - Method OnLookup - NamedType OverWriteExistingPONumberFilterLbl
trans-unit.target: Wilt u het bestaande filter overschrijven met een nieuw filter automatisch bouwen?

trans-unit.source: Do you want the system to automatically find a PO number filter?
trans-unit.note: Ask user to use automatic PO number filtering.
TableExtension ALR Template - Field Auto PO search filter - Method OnLookup - NamedType NewPONumberFilterLbl
trans-unit.target: Moet het systeem automatisch in het document zoeken naar geldige bestelnummers?

trans-unit.source: Advanced Line Recognition Type
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Advanced Line Recognition Type - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Geavanceerde lijnherkenningstype

trans-unit.source: Standard,Anchor linked field,Field search with caption,Field search with column heading
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Advanced Line Recognition Type - Property OptionCaption
trans-unit.target: Standaard,Anker gekoppeld veld,Veld zoeken met bijschrift,Veld zoeken met kolomhoofding

trans-unit.source: Field Width
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field ALR Typical Value Field Width - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Veldbreedte

trans-unit.source: Caption Offset X
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field ALR Value Caption Offset X - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Offset bijschrift X

trans-unit.source: Caption Offset Y
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field ALR Value Caption Offset Y - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Offset bijschrift Y

trans-unit.source: Copy value from previous value
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Copy Value from Previous Value - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Kopieer waarde van de vorige lijn

trans-unit.source: Value position
trans-unit.note: Defines if the value should be searched above or below the standard line.
TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Field value position - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Waarde positie

trans-unit.source: ,Above standard line,Below standard line
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Field value position - Property OptionCaption
trans-unit.target: ,boven de standaard lijn, onder de standaard lijn

trans-unit.source: Value search direction

TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Field value search direction - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Waarde zoekrichting

trans-unit.source: Downwards,Upwards
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Field value search direction - Property OptionCaption
trans-unit.target: Onderwaarts,Omhoog

trans-unit.source: Linked to field
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Linked Field - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Gekoppeld aan veld

trans-unit.source: Offset Height
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Offset Bottom - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Offset hoogte

trans-unit.source: Offset Left
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Offset Left - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Offset linkerkant

trans-unit.source: Offset Width
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Offset Right - Property Caption

trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Offset Top - Property Caption
trans-unit.target: Offset bovenkant

trans-unit.source: Replacement field
trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Replacement Field - Property Caption

trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Replacement Field Type - Property Caption

trans-unit.note: TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Replacement Field Type - Property OptionCaption
trans-unit.target: Kop,Lijn

TableExtension ALR Template Field - Field Sorting - Property Caption
